<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Difficulty

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks specific difficulty settings of the current user. Difficulty flag names can be found in the <tt>CfgDifficultyPresets</tt> config class or in 
[[server.armaprofile|ArmA profile]] file under class <tt>DifficultyPresets/xxx/Options</tt> (xxx being Recruit, Regular or Veteran). This command replaces [[difficultyEnabled]] as many options have multiple values and former command only provided [[Boolean]] return.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''difficultyOption''' optionName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> optionName: [[String]] - difficulty option name

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] ([[difficultyOption]] "friendlyTags");</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Remember last [[cameraView]] per vehicle:<code>[[player]] [[addEventHandler]] ["GetOutMan", 
{
	[[params]] ["_unit", "_role", "_vehicle", "_turret"];
	_unit [[setVariable]] [_vehicle [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_netId]], [[cameraView]]];
}];
[[player]] [[addEventHandler]] ["GetInMan", 
{
	[[if]] ([[difficultyOption]] "thirdPersonView" == 2) [[then]]
	{
		[[params]] ["_unit", "_role", "_vehicle", "_turret"];
		_unit [[switchCamera]] (_unit [[getVariable]] [_vehicle [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_netId]], "INTERNAL"]);
	};
}];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[difficulty]], [[difficultyEnabledRTD]], [[Arma 3: Difficulty Settings]], [[missionDifficulty]]
</value></part></template>
